title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.1 - Purpose of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.1 - Purpose of rules

State Regulations

The purpose of these rules is to establish criteria for

Radon Assessment Specialists (RASs) who shall be eligible to provide radon
diagnostic services under the Radon Diagnosis Assistance Program. Under this
program, eligible homeowners with elevated levels of radon may receive
financial assistance from the State Department of Health for the performance of
radon diagnostic services and the preparation of specifications for appropriate
mitigation measures in one-to-four family residences, where such services are
provided by RASs listed by the New York State Energy Office (SEO) in accordance
with the rules set forth in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7930.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
